Katherine Erickson
Projects Resume Posts

Projects

  • Laura Erickson’s For The Birds, 2016

    Django, MySQL

    A birder’s portfolio and resource to learn about birds. Content is navigable both by bird species, and also by her work (including radio show, blog, photographs, etc.).

    • code
    • schema

  • Lotka-Volterra Project, 2016

    Javascript, D3

    An illustration of a predator-prey-invasive species model, inspired by the Lotka-Volterra model, to apply to the attendees at a benefit luncheon for the Black Rock Forest Consortium.

    • code

  • Genome-Wide Early Embryonic Genetic Interactions, 2015

    Django, MySQL

    Interface to record, navigate, and analyze millions of pairwise gene knockdowns for an experiment to uncover genetic interactions in the nematode Caenorhabditis elegans.

    • view within NYU network
    • code
    • schema

  • Gunsalus & Piano Labs, 2014

    Django, MySQL

    Website for a genomics lab. Includes public-facing pages, as well as private pages to navigate and query the lab’s databases.

    • view within NYU network
    • code
    • schema

  • Early Embryo Localizome, 2013

    Django, MySQL

    Interface to explore the results (including videos) from a large-scale protein localization study.

    • view within NYU network
    • code
    • schema
    • screenshots

  • Conservation Big Year, 2013

    Wordpress, MySQL

    Wordpress custom pages and theme to track the progress of a birder’s yearlong project to see birds of conservation concern.

    • screenshots

  • Bacteria Library Growth History, 2010

    PHP, MySQL

    Interface to visualize the growth history of bacteria libraries.

    • screenshots

  • Roadkill Across America created with Michael P. Geraci, 2010

    PHP, MySQL

    Website documenting roadkill observed on a cross-country bicycle trip.

    • screenshots
